CIRCUIT COURT OF

PATRICK CRADDOCK, CLERK
IN THE CIRCUIT COURT OF TALLAPOOSA COUNTY, ALABAMA
ALEX CITY DIVISION
MCGREGOR CHRISTOPHER BLAINE, )
Plaintiff, )
)
V. ) Case No.: DR-2023-900051.01
)
GILLILAND BRITTANY MICHELLE, )
Defendant. )
ORDER
MOTION TO RECONSIDER filed by MCGREGOR CHRISTOPHER BLAINE is hereby
GRANTED. The court will allow the day of the nightly dinner to be moved to either
Tuesday or Thursday if the Wednesday night dinner conflicts with a pre-scheduled
activity in which the child is involved. Should this become a common problem the court
will make all needed and appropriate modifications to visitation. The court warns all
parties that the time for gamesmanship has passed. The court would prefer not to
micromanage the parties herein; however, it will be required to if the parties continue to
work against each other in dealing with the best interest of their child.
DONE this 7thday of November, 2024.
/s/ STEVEN R PERRYMAN
CIRCUIT JUDGE
